metadata.title: CVE-2023-37732 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Yasm v1.3.0.78 was found prone to NULL Pointer Dereference in/libyasm/intnum.c and /elf/elf.c, which allows the attacker to cause adenial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
